Set Date Set Time p.p. change changes direct Delete personal data This app stores your personal data to make future bookings easier. Your personal data are not communicated to any third parties nor used for marketing purposes. You can choose not to have your data stored. In this case, you will need to re-enter your data when making each new booking. Personal data Are you sure you want to delete your personal data? You will need to re-enter it to make future bookings. This app uses your personal data only to make booking faster. To review personal data go to Settings. For this part of your journey, please buy tickets from the local transport provider.
